name: Bob Michalski
text: Excellent pie! I started out with a side salad that had the most beautiful lettuce. The house dressing was so tasty. Wonderful service. The cool 70s music was appropriate for the atmosphere. …More

name: funTimes
text: We absolutely love this place. Good selection of local and craft and regular beer. Great pizza and awesome dessert.

name: BERTHA BOOKMAN
text: The food Is great. There services are nice.  The job likes this place.  It's a variety for a lot of people.  It's convenient they deliver and they are happy people.  Give it a like. Give it a try. Like my post if you're going to try it or have tried it.

name: Haleigh Christmus
text: I love the pizza here! They have all the beer on tap, but the pizza here is just amazing. And huge! This place is very kid friendly too, so bring all your kids, drink all the beer, and have fun! Cool atmosphere too it speaks to my inner hippie.

name: Anthony D'Elia
text: This mellow mushroom is nicer than others I have been to.  They kill the Maui Wowie pizza.  It's no longer on menu but still the best pizza they make.

name: Brad Saunders
text: They had a nice selection of food other than pizza, which was a nice change for a lunch. Staff was pleasant but not the most attentive. Chicken Caesar was a very generous portion, the sandwiches were also good, but very high calorie.

name: Cameron Glover
text: Called to see if there was a wait and they told me no. We arrived 2 minutes later and there were 20 people waiting outside and the host said it was a 30-45 minutes wait. There’s no way they went on a wait in 2 minutes. They clearly just wanted us there.

name: Kaili Wall
text: Wanted to try a new place tonight . Pizza was nasty extremely doughy, the Cheesy bread was maybe halfway melted my husband ordered a calzone to go and it still wasn’t even ready and we ordered it with our pizza. The service was okay but …More

name: J. Callahan
text: The food is top quality services amazing and I really enjoy the atmosphere

name: Ezekiel Sandoval
text: Excellent pizza  service, all around. Good Fran. ownership, same quality service in San Antonio, Tx or Lex. SC.

name: A Mack
text: Very very very good pizza. Bartender/server was great.

name: Patricia Driggers
text: Rachel the bartender was great. She waited on you with a smile and was very nice ❤️

name: lee huffstetler
text:
Service was Sub Par.
The pizza was not good.
I used to dine in and get to go orders from mellow mushroom I'm years past and loved the pizza so needless to say I'm Disappointed. : (

name: Kathleen Schumann
text: We ordered two pepperoni pizzas yesterday.  When we got home with them we found that both crusts were dark brown, almost black.  Terrible. My question is why would they sell us burned pizza. And very expensive pizza also. Don’t know what’s …More

name: Bryan Sirak
text:
Awesome Pizza,
The Holy Shiitake is amazing I could eat some right now.

name: Michelle Espinosa
text: Wonderful place to eat . Great family atmosphere.  Tons of selections. The best is the Mighty Meaty

name: Simply Regal
text: We have been eating here for years and always enjoy our meals. Friendly staff and great service.

name: amanda Wright
text: Above average service which was a pleasant surprise! Food was just okay, but unfortunately, that still is better than normal for us. We will be back simply because we got great service. We ordered a small pizza and a burger. The burger was …More

name: Jeff Schmidt
text: We are used to eating at the mellow mushroom in Nashville Tennessee. So we were excited to try this location. I have to say, it's  not as good as the other locations, were used to. Actually we were  quite disappointed in the atmosphere, and pizza. I think we'll stick with the other locations, not recommended.

name: Milton Cooley
text: Called in a pizza order and arrived to pick it up half hour later as directed. When I arrived at the drive thru window was told the pizza would be ready in half an hour. I was told to pull into the parking lot and wait. They apologized …More

name: Michelle Cross
text: You'll see just want a great pizza and more taste like .... Absolutely worth stopping in and checking out their food. It is a old vibe with a Fresh great menu to choose from. You've got to check it out ...I no if you like pizza and More …More

name: OG Fresh
text: Great food at reasonable prices with top quality staff.

name: Jane Chinault
text: I ordered a pizza and salad for dinner to be delivered around 6:00. The meal never arrived. When I called I was told it wasn't their problem and I needed to complain to the delivery service. Very unsatisfactory!!

name: Lindsey Keller
text: Salad was good. Pizza was meh. Service took FOREVER. I don't blame the waitress. She was sweet. Wouldn't go back for the pizza but maybe for a salad.

name: Briana Wilson
text: This was the best mellow mushroom I've ever been to! The wait staff was great, the art was beautiful, and they had great local specials. The food was super fresh and beyond delicious. The mushroom pizza I ordered was hands down the best pizza I've ever had! 10/10 recommend!

name: Lady Angler Kate Hough
text: Great customer service and made the perfect pizza along with a great place to have lunch with friends!

name: Ryan Lanahan
text: Always highly satisfied with the food and most excellent staff.  Kinsley. Is. Amazing.

name: Phil Allison
text: My wife and I just hung out at the bar here. But the appetizers were good and the bar was very relaxing and laid back. …More

name: Shane Hutto
text: Food was good.  U especially loved the mushroom soup

name: Gary Graham
text: Price may be a little on the high side but the pizza is so amazing. Treat yourself.

name: Eric Schmidt
text: Dining area was odd to start off. Wait staff was minimal, and nothing we ordered really seemed complete or prepped right. Appetizer came well after the main meal was served. Not what we expected compared to the excellent locations in Raleigh, NC.

name: Uga Big daddy
text: Bald manager with glasses is rude. Terrible customer service

name: Nameless
text: tbe best pizza ans hot bronie in Lexington

name: Justice Stilley

Absolutely fabulous. And then my parents showed up and ate all the food. Yeesh.
Rachel is the best! Love you girl, thanks for everything!

name: Hattie Lee
text: They took extremely long for a mobile order. The staff is not welcoming at all.

text:
Main course was good (Kamikaze), service was friendly and attentive.
Only drawback was the appetizer (spinach artichoke dip) which came out warm as opposed to the melty cheesy goodness we're used to having.

name: Michael Gibbons
text: Always predictably good!

text:

name: Emily Barton
text: We really enjoy eating out. But my allergies to onions and garlic make ordering difficult at best. Our server Lyndie accepted the challenge with a big smile on her face! I do believe this was the best pizza I've ever had. My tastebuds miss …More

name: Kellye Watts
text: Still one of our favorite places to go for pizza ~ can't beat the great beer selection. Service is always good. Food is good too. Fun place to go.

name: Donna Nunamaker
text: Visited the LEXINGTON location for the first time today for our granddaughters 13th birthday celebration (her choice) ...we had a party of 18 and our server, Lyndie was amazing! Having owned a restaurant for 7 years I know the value of …More

name: Bryan Jackson
text: Great place for lunch, or dinner. Good pizza. Fun atmosphere. Laid back. Actually a pretty chill lunch spot.

name: PrincessRuth Marie
text: I have a certain kind of pizza that I like to eat and Mellow Mushroom in Lexington is only one who can come close to making my pizza.

text: Always a fun atmosphere! The staff are super friendly and they have some really great waitresses.

text: Mellow gets it right. They have the best crust in the business and they're specialty pies are on a playing field by themselves. It never gets old and I'm sure I'll be back soon.

text: Normally very good. This time not so much. Service was good. Pizza average at best. The restaurant itself was not even clean during the slow hours.

name: Alexandra Mason
text: Went there with my male friend to eat pizza. Was my first time there so I was looking forward to it. We had a female server with red hair and two thigh tattoos (I don’t know her name). She was friendly, but only to the male friend I was …More

name: Caroline Stevens
text: The truffle pizza and the house special was fantastic!

name: Lindsay Voy
text: Came here for lunch today with my fiancé. We didn’t have our face masks with us and the host told us we had to leave because they wouldn’t be serving us without them. We were not offered face masks. Rudest host I’ve ever encountered, we will never be coming here again.

name: Ishah Talarico
text: Most of the time Awesome food, very convenient location. Most recent visit the wings arrived cold but the waiter was kind enough to remove them from the check. Sometimes things go wrong but handling it gracefully is what makes a true professional. Hats of to our waiter👍🏼

name: abby tabby
text: Theres a couple things I like at this location,  the outside seating option because at times the inside is so very packed and also the staff seems genuinely nice and professional. I have had a few recent visits that kind of show case some …More

name: Timothy Hill
text: Best pizza and very soothing atmosphere. Nice to come here after a long day at work.

name: Eddie Reese
text: Very good as always.

text: I had a killer build your own salad. Good enough for even us not vegetable people. Lol

name: Candy S
text: The pizza is amazing! No complaints.

name: Mike Ward
text: I always love going to Mellow Mushroom. Today the salad was fresh and the pizza was delicious. We enjoy the prompt and friendly waitress. We will surely be back for lunch again.

name: Sarah Smithers
text: Service was good and the food was out fast. Clean place. Only complaint is we ordered the cheese dip with pretzel bits and the dip was burnt. It tasted like it sat in the pan for too long.

name: A Shep
text: Autumn at Mellow Mushroom was awesome and super welcoming to these newbies to the area. She informed about the weekly events- Mon small cheese pizza $5 all day, Tues pints $2.50 all day, Trivia at 7:30p, Wed wine $3 all day. When deciding …More

name: Ryan Drinkwalter
text: Had the white pizza, so good. They use top notch ingredients; you can taste the difference. Best tasting pizza crust in the region.

name: Todd Robinson
text: Great pizza. My fav is the mighty meaty. Salads are great too. Good beer selection. Fun atmosphere. Not great parking in Lexington though.

Pizza Hut's meal lover's better compared to this one, and Pizza Hut is not my favorite.  Give customer's the quality they pay for.

Pizza , hand tossed  half and half one side lots and lots of cheese....other Hawaiian style with pineapple ham bacon excetera..

text: The pizza was good. They use canned mushrooms, which is odd since they are a gourmet pizza restaurant and "mushroom" is part of their name. I'm not a fan of paper straws either.

text: The veggie calzone was YUMMMM!!  Our waitress was very attentive and I'm looking forward to trying something different next time.

text: Had to have lunch one last time before moving to Winston-Salem. This is by far and away the best restaurant in Lexington and I’m going to miss this place more than close relatives in my family.

text: Best pizza an salad vreat service

text: Went to Mellow this weekend and had the best serve I've ever had in my life. Her name was Lauran and give that girl a raise or something. Nice, sweet, and great with the kids. Awesome food and a fun time.

text: They have changed something in the pizza dough that has completely changed since they first came to Columbia.  I don't know what it is, but please go back!

name: Mishelin Lee
text: Food was cold and service was bad. Sent the pizza back to reheat and it came back burned. Yesterday was not a good day there. Lots of people complaining that were sitting around us. The place is not the same anymore.

name: anthony martellini
text: Love their pizza, and selections

name: Scott Stone
text: Great Place For Pizza And Beer!

text: Love eating here. Great atmosphere and good food. Lots of fun looking at the wall. Very clean.

name: Melinda Bisbee
text: Came here for lunch.  Wait staff was friendly and good but overworked so everything took longer than it should have.  Only saw 3 waitresses and no hostess so they had to take on that job too.  Again wait staff was very good but stretched too thin.  Need more staff on duty for a busy lunch hour.

name: Rodell Nesbit
text: This was my worst experience at Mellow Mushroom. I was a part of a party of five. They forgot to make a pizza for a member of my party and brought me two wrong pizzas. I told them to cancel my pizza offer. I don't know what they had going on but it'll be a very long time before I go back: - (

name: Noah Berry
text: This place is good, join their text club and you can get some sweet deals. I promise they haven't paid me to say that, I legit got free bruschetta with my last pizza. Although Mellow Mushroom should pay me for how much I tell people about it but I won't worry about it too much

name: sherry mason

text: The food was good but the service was so terrible. My friend and I were obviously finished with our food for ~30 minutes but sat there in the deserted restaurant waiting for our check. It was incredibly inconvenient especially since we are making our trip home and still had 5 hours to drive. Don't go there if you expect timely service.

name: Brian Price
text: I will never be back to mellow mushroom! The best part of my experience is the fact that I asked for a drink an waited 15 mins to get asked What can I get you to drink! When I responded with I gave you my drink order. She smacks her teeth …More

text: We had a great experience, even with a toddler and an infant. The pretzels, both salt and parmesan, were fantastic. The cheese pizza was perfect for our 3 year old. The small buffalo chicken pizza was great for two adults to share with leftovers. We will be back again!

text: The pizza is amazing but the customer service is awful.  Basically the waitress does walk bys, she just drops stuff on your table as she walks by.  Asks how everything is as she walks by,  not even pausing. The food is worth it,  we would go back just for the food or maybe take out

name: Christi Harris
text: This place has the best pizza ever!!! They can make whatever kind of pizza you like. They even make pizza without tomato sauce. They have calozones, subs. They have deserts. They have a bar.

text: Menu has changed a bit which I’m not happy about. Food was very good. Service was normal. I wish that restaurants would stick with what is working for them instead of changing up recipes but I would still return.
